title: Sjiq by Novo Typo
content:
Sjiq, a new typeface by Novo Typo – (type)designers from Amsterdam, The Netherlands.  
 [www.novotypo.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415070027/http:/www.novotypo.nl/ "www.novotypo.nl")

Beautiful typefaces from The Netherlands  
 [www.novotypo.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415070027/http:/www.novotypo.nl/ "www.novotypo.nl")

comments.content:
If you want more exposure, content like this should be posted on the **[Release board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415070027/http:/typophile.com/forum/7)**. People tend not to look here for release announcements.

A link directly to the typeface in question would also be very helpful.

Good information about Novo Typo .in this way ink play important roll . [canon ink](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415070027/http:/www.canonink.co.uk/) is another important type of ink . Maybe in time I will consider having this as my blogging platform. Even though lots of people saying this platform is hard to handle.
